Hello and thank you for submitting a new icon.
Can you update the following according to your icon please? Only one icon per request.

## Your icon

**Name of your icon:** your name
**Color:** the hexadecimal color
**URL:** Can you provide a URL to the site of your icon?
**Category:** Choose one : Places? Social? Photography? Video? Services? Communication? Pro? Feed? Bookmark? Music? Design?
**Tags:** Some tags about the icons ? (Examples: Social, network, Pro, etc.)

You can also attach an svg file of your icon to this ticket to facilitate its integration into Socicon.
